disabled.description: Whether the option group is disabled

:default-value.description: Default value in uncontrolled mode for option groups
:default-value.description_zh: 选项组非受控模式下的默认值

:max.description: The maximum number of checkboxes that can be checked
:max.description_zh: 可被勾选的 checkbox 的最大数量

:min.description: The minimum number of checkboxes that can be checked
:min.description_zh: 可被勾选的 checkbox 的最小数量

v-model:value.description: The value in controlled mode for the option group
v-model:value.description_zh: 选项组受控模式下的值

events.name: update:value
events.description: A callback when the value of an option group changes
events.params: (value: string | number, meta: { actionType: check | uncheck, value: string | number }) => void
events.description_zh: 选项组的值改变时的回调
